data.name: Astralis
data.detailed_description:
Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekseï Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep. You are facing a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship "Astralis" lost in an unkown part of the universe.

In this FPS horror sci-fi, you can rely on 5 unique weapons to confront your ennemies. You can also upgrade each weapon with 2 mods to gain unique effects.

As an enhanced soldier, you have the ability to control time but in the spaceship corridors you may found 2 other powers as much as powerful !

Will you unveil the mysteries of the soviet mission ? What final choice will you make ? it's up to you !

data.short_description: Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekseï Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep to face a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship "Astralis" lost in an unkown part of the universe. Astralis is FPS horror sci-fi game with retro graphics and sounds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GForce700
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 365 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Jeu de tir (gerbe de sang). Cadavres au sol.
